abstract: New York City Police Officer Joel Edouard is convicted of misdemeanor assault for stomping head of Jahmi-El Cuffee while he lay prone on Brooklyn street during arrest.
lead_paragraph: Officer Joel Edouard faces up to a year in jail on misdemeanor assault charges stemming from a July 2014 arrest in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn.

headline.main: Officer Convicted of Assault for Stomping on Suspect’s Head
headline.print_headline: Officer Convicted After He Stomped on Suspect’s Head

snippet: Officer Joel Edouard faces up to a year in jail on misdemeanor assault charges stemming from a July 2014 arrest in Bedford-Stuyvesant, Brooklyn.
